DOC.brief_summary: To examine satiety effect eat Okara .
DOC.brief_title: The Satiety Effect After Okara Compared Porridge Eating
DOC.detailed_description: This single blind , cross-over design . Study population include 10 subject . The patient randomly assign receive one two meal , 48 gram Okara 40 gram ( similar caloric value ) semolina two occasion ( two visit ) . After eat , subject stay close room , without watch irritation . After three hour , patient fill VAS questionnaire , get standard meal . The meal weigh . Okara natural water extract food grade soy product , contain approximately 35 % protein ( mfb ) , 43 % dietary fiber .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Age 2065 year old Written Informed Consent History gastrointestinal surgery On medication may influence gastric emptying , medication weight loss Patient PPI treatment , H2 Blockers medication weight loss Known allergy soy Pregnancy breastfeed Smoking Athletes Metabolic syndrome diabetes mellitus Family history metabolic syndrome diabetes mellitus Weight loss > 2 kg two month study
